refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns client version number as an integer.

refsect1.title: Return values
refsect1.para: A number that represents the MaxDB client library version in format: main_version*10000 + minor_version *100 + sub_version. For example, 7.5.0 is returned as 70500.
This is useful to quickly determine the version of the client library to know if some capability exists.

refsect1.title: Example

example.title: maxdb_get_client_version
example.programlisting:
<?php

/* We don't need a connection to determine
   the version of MaxDB client library */

printf("Client library version: %d\n", maxdb_get_client_version());
?>
